summary: This document is an email chain between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley from August 2009, discussing personal travel and relaxation. It includes a confidentiality notice indicating the communication may be attorney-client privileged and is property of Jeffrey Epstein, with a JPMorgan Chase confidentiality request.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Sender and recipient of emails in the chain, discussing travel plans and checking on Jes Staley's location.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Recipient and sender of emails, discussing vacation locations including Nantucket, Martha's Vineyard, Newport, and Stonington, Connecticut, and mentioning his brother Peter.

persons.name: Peter
persons.context: Mentioned as Jes Staley's brother who spent the night and commented on Jes looking relaxed.

connections.description: Engaged in personal email correspondence discussing vacation travels and well-being.
Brothers; Peter spent the night with Jes and commented on his relaxed appearance.

events.title: Email exchange about vacations
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley exchange emails discussing Staley's recent vacations in Nantucket, Martha's Vineyard, Newport, and Stonington, Connecticut.

keyFacts: Email communication shows personal relationship between Jeffrey Epstein and JPMorgan executive Jes Staley in August 2009.
Document includes confidentiality notice stating it may be attorney-client privileged and is property of Jeffrey Epstein.
JPMorgan Chase requested confidential treatment for this document (JPM-SDNY-00000381, JPM-SDNY-00000382).
